modName: Sword of the Ancient Tongues - Weight watchers edition
summary: Bit of a scaled down version of Corvalho1's Sword of the Ancient Tongues.
descriptionHtml:
I've seen plenty of comments about how the 1H version of Corvalho's sword looks to fat and heavy to be wielded efficiently, and how the scabbard appears to pretty much float in midair. I decided to edit the mesh to address these issues. Blade is thinner and is also a bit less wide, and I also removed the scabbard. Feedback is appreciated as far as size, if the general consensus is that it's too small, I'll increase the size.
<br />
<br />Credit to Corvalho1 for original upload. If this mod offends, I will remove it.
author: Corvalho1
